Join the feared Reaver clan with this Reaver pack. Includes the full Golden Skull - Superheavy Reaver armor set and two Reaver modified weapons, the Reaver Anvil Revolver and Reaver C-6 Carnivore Assault Rifle. This bundle contains the following items: 
 
 1. Golden Skull - Superheavy Reaver Leg Armor 
 2. Golden Skull - Superheavy Reaver Helmet 
 3. Golden Skull - Superheavy Reaver Body Armor 
 4. Golden Skull - Superheavy Reaver Gloves 
 5. Golden Skull - Superheavy Reaver Boots 
 6. Reaver Anvil Revolver 
 7. Reaver C-6 Carnivore Assault Rifle [#Legal]
